TopicTitle: My space junk brings all the boys to the yard.

Articles.Content:
So, I decided I want my airspace a little more....crowded.

I want your persistence files.

Rules:

Stock parts only, please.

I consider any craft that is not on the surface of Kerbin to be 'nonrecoverable.' So, any persistence bits you have that have craft pieces, etc, not on the surface of kerbin, please attach.

Thanks.

I\'ll post screenshots of my crowded space as it crowds up.

While it isn\'t much, here\'s a start for you.

Includes:

 A missed shot at Minmus which is now leaving the system

 Equatorial debris from said launch (about 6 pieces in same orbit)

 A lander orbiting Kerbol.

 1 debris in polar orbit.

 A lander on Minmus

 and a small bunch of planes on Kerbin (including one fairly close to the center of the north pole).

Sidenote: I\'ve never shared persistence before, and am only working under assumption that the persistent.sfs

in the saves\default folder is actually the correct file. If this is incorrect, just say so and I\'ll fix as soon as i can.

edit: so i totally forgot (forgive me, 430 am and all) but a couple of the planes have a mechjeb part on their back.

i\'ll leave the file here for now, but if i can find time tomorrow, i\'ll go through and delete/end flights with the offending part.
Just use the kessler mod and watch your pc grind to a halt.

Its quite a cool idea to have a bit of the communities space junk floating around in one save, It will give us an idea of how much we all spew out every mission, just like on earth ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Sounds like mine\'s real clean, then... I do Mun and Minmus missions without \*ever\* leaving behind any debris in orbit.

Clean rocket design FTW!
